Role: Senior Java Software Developer

Location: Montreal, QC-Hybrid-3 days to ofc

Duration: 6+ Months

Job Description

What's the Role:

Collaborating as part of a cross-functional Agile team to create and enhance software that enables state of the art, next generation Counterparty Data platform that enables our cloud transformation journey
Expertise in application, data and infrastructure architecture disciplines
Working with large, complex data sets from a variety of sources
Participate in the rapid development of user-driven prototypes to identify technical options and inform multiple architectural approaches
Building efficient storage and search functions over structured and unstructured data Utilizing programming languages like Java, Scala, Python, Relational and NoSQL databases
Leveraging DevOps techniques and practices like Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment, Test Automation, Build Automation and Test-Driven Development to enable the rapid delivery of working code utilizing tools like Jenkins, Gradle and Git

Basic Qualifications

10+ years of experience in development of high-quality java solutions
Experience as a Scrum master for a distributed team
Strong analytical and problem-solving ability
Experience with Java8+, Kafka, Mongo, Event driven systems
Experience with design and build of high performance, low latency distributed systems.
Hands-on experience with Azure/AWS, Kubernetes, Docker, Spring Boot, Microservices.
Experience with SQL, NoSql like MongoDB
Have experience documenting system level software and knows best pacts about ‘docs as code’ (e.g., by having used Git, Markdown)
Familiarity and hands-on experience with profiling, code efficiency, and building software via continuous delivery pipeline
Knowledge of Monitoring and Observability Tools like Prometheus, Grafana
